attributes.action: We demand a General Election and a new Brexit referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The BBC coverage of Brexit is evidence enough of The current dysfunction of parliament. I didn't vote for this situation.
attributes.background: The current government is not fit for purpose. The number of No votes shows a level of indecision and uncertainty in parliament. In the country there is more clarity and forward planning,  particularly in the business community. The current dysfunctionality of parliament is a national embarrassment.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's very similar to petitions we already have open. 
 
You might like to sign and share this petition: 

Hold a new Brexit referendum at the next General Election if UK has not left EU https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/239032
